title: Baked pasta shells filled with cheese
description: A definite family favourite - cheesy pasta shells with a simple tomato sauce, baked until crisp, golden and gooey.
ingredients: 1 quantity of Salsa di Pomodoro (see below)
1 ball of mozzarella cheese, very finely diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 x 400g tins of plum tomatoes, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
